## About
I became the Program Administrator for Chromebook Data Science Plus (CBDS+) at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health in October 2018.

I attended Loyola University Maryland and graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in psychology.

* Planning memorable events
